{{Character |character name = Mr. Bunch |gender = Male |ep = "[[The One With The Lesbian Wedding]]" |number = 1 |relatives = [[Mrs. Bunch]] (wife)
[[Susan Bunch]] (daughter)
[[Carol Willick]] (daughter-in-law)
[[Ben Geller]] (step-grandson) }}'''Mr. Bunch''' is the father of [[Susan Bunch]]. He appears to be in the military and is seen in "[[The One With The Lesbian Wedding]]" when he and his wife are leading their daughter down the aisle. He seems very supportive of Susan and Carol's relationship. During the reception, he is seen with [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] talking to him. Like his wife, he has no lines. ==Appearances== * "[[The One With The Lesbian Wedding]]" (First appearance) [[Category:Friends Characters]] [[Category:Season 2 Characters]] [[Category:Fathers]] [[Category:Grandfathers]] [[Category:One Appearance Only]] [[Category:Males]] [[Category:Characters]]
